Articles.Content:
I have come across another thread which stated that new versions of unity do not work well with animating emissives. However, that thread was last posted on in 2013.

It was recommended that people instead download versions of unity older than version 4.6. Is that still the case?

This is the ancient thread I found:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25023-Emissive-tutorial/page2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25023-Emissive-tutorial/page2)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-17T05:25:12Z" title="03/17/2015 05:25  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 17, 2015</time> by unsociableTim**
